info.name: community.secondlife.com - Blue Goo theme
info.description: This is a somewhat muted blue and gray theme for community.secondlife.com. I hope that it will be a little easier on some eyes than the clean but *very bright* default.
info.additionalInfo:
2011-05-15 - force pre in messages to not wrap
2011-04-24 - fit on 1024px displays
2011-04-16 - archive subheadings
2011-04-04 - color changes for nested quotes, highlighted messages
2011-03-18 - highlighting for preferences sub-tab links (2nd: make the subtabs tabs, why not?)
2011-03-17 - make forum highlighting function work
2011-03-12 - section and preferences tab highlighting
2011-03-11 - slight shadow for statistics on badges, catch a few more bits of green text
2011-03-07 - revert username method from background to shadow, will probably upload a tiny separate style for the background option.
2011-03-06 - lose kudos button bezel; first& last thread page numbers were wrong color
2011-03-05 second - new formatting for quotes and signatures
2011-03-05 - tweaked the badge shadowing and some button hightlights
2011-03-04 - initial + fix comment oops
